title: Python: The most versatile programming language
text: Python is a versatile programming language that can be used for a wide range of tasks, including web development, machine learning, and data science.

title: Java: The enterprise programming language
text: Java is a popular programming language for enterprise application development, as it is secure, scalable, and portable.

title: C: The low-level programming language
text: C is a low-level programming language that is used for system software development, device drivers, and high-performance applications.

title: C++: The high-performance programming language
text: C++ is a high-level programming language that is used for high-performance application development, such as games and scientific applications.

title: JavaScript: The client-side programming language
text: JavaScript is a client-side programming language that is used to create interactive web pages.
